meanings.definition: Of or relating to the south.
meanings.sent1: The austral penguins live in the southern part of the continent.
meanings.sent2: The austral climate is known for its cooler temperatures.
meanings.sent3: The austral explorer traveled to the southern lands in search of new discoveries.
meanings.sent4: Her austral personality always gravitated towards the colder regions of the world.
meanings.sent5: The austral sun cast long shadows in the evening, signaling the approach of night.

meanings.definition: A wind blowing from the south.
meanings.sent1: The sailors adjusted the sails to catch the austral wind blowing steadily from the south.
meanings.sent2: The austral breeze brought relief from the heat of the day.
meanings.sent3: The austral wind whispered secrets from distant lands as it passed through the trees.
meanings.sent4: The austral wind carried the scent of salt and adventure as it swept across the coastline.
meanings.sent5: The austral gusts rustled the leaves, creating a soothing melody in the quiet afternoon.
